about_the_game:
Delve deeper into the enchanted world of "Royal Romances: Endless Winter" with this thrilling DLC that brings four new locations, mysteries and challenges! Packed with additional mini-games, puzzles, and hidden objects, this expansion invites you on an adventure to explore uncharted territories and unravel secrets that will change the course of your romantic tale!

From dusty shelves of ancient libraries to the mystical underwater city, each new location is filled with unique challenges and secrets to uncover. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

💋 VISIT THE LIBRARY!
Step into a world of knowledge and mystery within the walls of the expansive library. Search through ancient books, artifacts, and manuscripts, finding hidden objects that are key to unlocking the deeper lore of the kingdom.

💋 CHECK OUT THE GOLD MINER'S TOWER!
Ascend the Gold Miner's Tower, where riches beyond imagination await. Solve complex puzzles and uncover precious gems like diamonds, rubies, and emeralds hidden among the lavish décor.

💋 EXPLORE THE MAGICAL VAULT!
The magical vault holds more than just treasures; it contains clues integral to your quest. With every hidden object found, piece together the puzzle that will illuminate the overarching mystery.

💋 COME TO THE UNDERWATER CITY OF THE BANSHEE!
Visit the underwater city, surrounded by jellyfish, pearls, and marine life. Search through this mesmerizing aquatic landscape to discover what secrets the stone doors of the banshee city conceal.

Every new location offers a treasure trove of items and secrets waiting to be discovered. Are you ready to uncover the truths that lie beneath the ice?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Sometimes saving one life can change the fate of many. Can you melt the ice in people's hearts?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
